channel.title: Getting my server online. HELP
channel.description: Hi , so I followed guides on YouTube on how to get a source code and use it to remake one for my own. I have downloaded the source + client in many 317's. I also set up my NO-IP DUC and got myself a .no-ip.biz , edited the server.java as shown below with my NO-IP. When I try to connect via moparisthebest.com or the client it won't work. Any tips? (ALL my ports are opened) [URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/1966/110704030913.png[/img][/URL] Edit : Apparently when I edited the server.java I can connect through the client that the download brought with the download. When I try to use the moparscape client I get this ... [URL=http://swiftkit.net][IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/5808/110704032219.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Getting my server online. HELP
item.dc:creator: @N_3_X N 3 X
item.description:
@N_3_X wrote:

[quote=“belhelmiel, post:2, topic:402431”][quote author=N 3 X link=topic=499487.msg3653009#msg3653009 date=1309850162]
Hi , so I followed guides on YouTube on how to get a source code and use it to remake one for my own.
I have downloaded the source + client in many 317’s.
I also set up my NO-IP DUC and got myself a .no-ip.biz , edited the server.java as shown below with my NO-IP. When I try to connect via moparisthebest.com or the client it won’t work. Any tips?
(ALL my ports are opened)

[/quote]

Take off the /s and *s from this part of the code:

(/*
*connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") ||
* connectingHost.equals("_.no-ip.biz")
*/true) {

the /* thing makes thing makes the code just a note until you put the */ so that code would be voided. so take all the * and / off and it will be fine.[/quote]
New code , still having problems

Note I have NO-IP DUC and uTorrent

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server online. HELP
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“N 3 X, post:1, topic:402431”]Hi , so I followed guides on YouTube on how to get a source code and use it to remake one for my own.
I have downloaded the source + client in many 317’s.
I also set up my NO-IP DUC and got myself a .no-ip.biz , edited the server.java as shown below with my NO-IP. When I try to connect via moparisthebest.com or the client it won’t work. Any tips?
(ALL my ports are opened)
[/quote]

Take off the /s and *s from this part of the code:

(/*
*connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") ||
* connectingHost.equals("_.no-ip.biz")
*/true) {

the /* thing makes thing makes the code just a note until you put the */ so that code would be voided. so take all the * and / off and it will be fine.

Read full topic
